name: KPSG
description: KPSG Group is the best Business Process as a Service (BPaaS) company in Indonesia that provides the required human resources, information systems, as well as supporting technology. We combine expertise in Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) and Information Technology Outsourcing (ITO) as a solution for more effective and efficient business operations. KPSG Group has been operating since 1990 as the first outsourcing company in Indonesia and has developed into a BPaaS company with a focus on Customer Experience (CX) and Employee Experience (EX) solutions as it is today.

Headline: Empower Your Company in Operational Transformation
ShortDescription: KPSG Group provides you with the people, process, and technology you need to improve your customer and employee experiences. By combining the benefits of ITO with our expertise in BPO.

Highlights.description: KPSG is a BPaaS company that many Indonesian companies have relied on. So far we have been trusted by more than 400 companies from various industries

enhanced_description: KPSG Group is a leading Business Process as a Service (BPaaS) company in Indonesia, established in 1990 as the nation's first outsourcing firm. They provide a holistic solution by combining expertise in Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) and Information Technology Outsourcing (ITO). KPSG offers the necessary human resources, information systems, and supporting technology to empower companies in their operational transformation. Their services focus on improving both Customer Experience (CX) and Employee Experience (EX), delivering effective and efficient business operations. KPSG is a trusted BPaaS provider, relied upon by over 400 companies across various industries in Indonesia, and is known for its extensive experience in handling diverse business productivity projects, from talent acquisition to marketing strategy management. They leverage advanced technology to offer cost-efficient solutions, including a Learning as a Service (LaaS) application, to accommodate evolving business needs.
